title: right
name: right
description: Returns a substring from end of the input string, with a length specified by the count argument.

arguments.name: string
arguments.description: A string or a variable that contains one.

arguments.name: count
arguments.description:
A non-zero integer. A positive value of n will return n characters from the end of the string.
		A negative value of n will return (length - n) characters from the end of the string.
